mapper.select: select reservations_id,non_member_name,reserve_days,reserve_time,menu_name,menu_times from reservations inner join menu on reservations.menu_id = menu.menu_id where reserve_days > #{day} order by reserve_days,reserve_time desc

select reservations_id,non_member_name,reserve_days,reserve_time,menu_name,menu_times from reservations inner join menu on reservations.menu_id = menu.menu_id where reserve_days = #{day} order by reserve_days,reserve_time desc
